# <a name="address-book-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="03cb5-102">Adresboek in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="03cb5-102">Address book in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="03cb5-103">Het adresboek van Outlook.com heet personen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="03cb5-103">Your Outlook.com address book is called People.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="03cb5-104">Als u naar de pagina [personen](https://outlook.live.com/people/) wilt gaan, selecteert u **personen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="03cb5-104">To go to your [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/) page, select **People**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="03cb5-105">in de benedenhoek van de pagina, of vanuit de app-selector, in de rechterbovenhoek van de pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="03cb5-105">at the bottom corner of the page, or from the app selector at the top corner of the page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="03cb5-106">Meer informatie over het [maken, weergeven en bewerken van contactpersonen in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="03cb5-106">Learn how to [Create, view, and edit contacts in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
